snippet: It took less than a week for an arbitrator to rule that N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell had the authority to discipline players said to be involved in the New Orleans Saints’ bounty scandal.
abstract: Artibrator affirms NFL commissioner Roger Goodell's authority to discipline players said to be involved in the New Orleans Saints bounty scandal; other NFL items noted.
lead_paragraph: It took less than a week for an arbitrator to rule that N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell had the authority to discipline players said to be involved in the New Orleans Saints’ bounty scandal.

headline.seo: Roger Goodell’s Power to Punish Saints in Bounty Scandal Is Affirmed
headline.main: Commissioner’s Power to Punish Saints in Bounty Scandal Is Affirmed
headline.print_headline: Arbitrator Affirms Power Of N.F.L. Commissioner
